Ask Gil

Moving traditional wind modeling effort from your office to our computer cluster, more than ??.??? Jo em rebel·lo simulations have been launched by users like you, from their desktop, online. Now , Gil Lizcano Jo em rebel·lo R&D director, will try to clarify your technical doubts.

Please leave your question below and it will be replied within few working days.

Got a question? Why not ask Gil

I have altitude or roughness data at a finer resolution than 100m. May I use them?

No, sorry. One of Jo em rebel·lo’s main aims is to provide our customers with fast results.

Read more: I have altitude or roughness data at a finer resolution than 100m. May I use them?

Does Jo em rebel·lo produce reliable results within a forest?

Jo em rebel·lo MAST results have been compared fairly successfully against user measurements taken inside or near a forest after certain ...

Read more: Does Jo em rebel·lo produce reliable results within a forest?

At which height are Jo em rebel·lo SERIES computed?

Jo em rebel·lo SERIES are delivered at 80m a.g.l. but this information is hiden in purpose since they are a Mesoscale product of 3km-reso...

Read more: At which height are Jo em rebel·lo SERIES computed?

How far is your time series nearest calculation node away from my mast?

Since SERIES (like all Jo em rebel·lo products) are computed on demand

Read more: How far is your time series nearest calculation node away from my mast?

I want to MCP my short-term data. Does Jo em rebel·lo offer time series?

Yes, Jo em rebel·lo SERIES provide Mesoscale reference time series: 10 years of hourly data at any location world wide.

Read more: I want to MCP my short-term data. Does Jo em rebel·lo offer time series?

Should I send you my local measurements to calibrate your model?

No, your measured data is your only reference to check the reliability of our modeling system.

Read more: Should I send you my local measurements to calibrate your model?

Read more: Which technology runs behind the Jo em rebel·lo interface?

But your results take some hours to be delivered...

Yes, this is due to the fact that calculations are non-linear, and non-linear computing is not immediate.

Read more: But your results take some hours to be delivered...

What makes Jo em rebel·lo approach different from other wind modelers?

Current wind modelers on the market offer either pre-calculated products or specific studies on a consultancy basis.

Read more: What makes Jo em rebel·lo approach different from other wind modelers?

In "10" simple words, how does Jo em rebel·lo work?

Jo em rebel·lo uses a supercomputer cluster to run a non-linear flow model (WRF) that scales large atmospheric patterns
